nbforms package¶

Module contents¶

class nbforms.Form(config_path='nbforms_config.json')¶

Bases: object

nbforms class for interacting with an nbforms server

The Form class sends requests to the nbforms server that records users’ resposnes. It provides auth so that users can be differentiated on the server, stores users’ responses from widgets, generates and displays the necessary widgets, and pulls data from the server for analysis.

Parameters:config_path (str) – Path to your nbforms config file
ask(*identifiers)¶

Ask any or all questions in the config file and display widgets

Parameters:identifiers – question identifiers to be asked in the widget; defaults to all
take_attendance()¶

Log attendance on the nbforms server

to_df(*identifiers, user_hashes=False)¶

Get data from the server and return a pandas DataFrame

Parameters:
  • identifiers – which questions to include in the table, defaults to all
  • user_hashes (bool) – whether to include hashes of usernames
to_table(*identifiers, user_hashes=False)¶

Get data from the server and return a datascience Table

Parameters:
  • identifiers – which questions to include in the table, defaults to all
  • user_hashes (bool) – whether to include hashes of usernames
